<!--==========================================================================--> <!--Abstracts the service and port definitons while importing everything else.--> <!--Do not edit this file with XmlSpy, it screws up all the commnents--> <!--==========================================================================--> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://atp.ihg.com/wsdl/crs/reservations/reservation/serviceinterface/v2" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:jms="http://cxf.apache.org/transports/jms" xmlns:crsResResSI="http://atp.ihg.com/wsdl/crs/reservations/reservation/serviceinterface/v2" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/wsdl/crs/reservations/reservation/serviceinterface/v2" location="../../../../../wsdl/crs/reservations/reservation/serviceinterface/ReservationServiceBinding.wsdl"/> <wsdl:service name="ReservationService"> <!--========================================================================================================================================= These ports/endpoints define how requests get to a service container from the ESB. Note that transport protocol level properties such as hostname, port etc., are externalized and usaually defined in a <jaxws:endpoint /> Spring bean definition section when using CXF.. =========================================================================================================================================--> <!--The service endpoint at the Service Container that expose Services using SOAP/JMS--> <wsdl:documentation>The reservation service provides CRUD operations for Reservation.
Response Overall Status Area: 'CRSResRes' - CRS Reservations Reservation
Response Error and Success Status Areas: 'RetrieveReservation'- Retrieve Reservation Operation 'CreateReservation' - Create Reservation Operation 'ModifyReservation' - Modify Reservation Operation 'CancelReservation' - Cancel Reservation Operation 'IgnoreReservation' - Ignore Reservation Operation 'CommitTransaction' - CommitTransaction Operation 'RetrieveCommittedAndSuspendedReservations' - RetrieveCommittedAndSuspendedReservations Operation 'CreateReservationGroup' - Create Reservation Group Operation
Response overall and Error Status Codes: Success Code: '000000' - Successfully processed the request
CommonErrorCodes: '011111' - Unknown Error '011112' - Failed processing the request
'016004' - Required Parameter is either null or empty
ServiceErrorCodes: '025306' - Last name provided does not match last name on reservation
ConnectorsErrorCodes: '030004' - Received less than or equal to 0 characters reading from BufferedReader '030005' - Number of characters to read from BufferedReader is less than or equal to 0 '030006' - Problem reading data from BufferedReader resulting in IOException
HttpConnectionErrorCodes: '040001' - There was a problem processing your request '040002' - The system took too long to process your request '040003' - The system is currently unable to process your request
HolidexErrorCodes: '050006' - An invalid hotel was provided '050017' - Holidex received an element in the transaction that it does not have defined '050019' - The maximum number of hotels was exceeded in the request '050021' - An invalid rate category or room code was provided '050034' - The reservation is already in use by another user session '050044' - An invalid guarantee method was provided '050064' - No name was provided. A name is required for this transaction '050091' - An invalid currency code was provided '050103' - No name was provided. A name is required for this transaction '050136' - A credit card number is required '050151' - The requested hotel code is invalid '050152' - An invalid date was provided '050162' - The hotel requested does not contain inventory for the specified date '050179' - The hotel requested does not contain inventory for the specified date '050193' - Arrival information is missing '050194' - Duplicate or similar names are not allowed in a reservation '050205' - Closed to 24 hour privilege '050206' - Invalid within 5 days of arrival '050207' - A guarantee is now required for this reservation '050217' - An address is required for this transaction '050248' - The FMDS database is unavailable at the moment '050250' - A travel agent guarantee cannot be used with a Priority Club estimated time of arrival '050252' - 24 hour privilege not available '050263' - The room type is invalid '050270' - The rate category was not found '050308' - An invalid expiration date was provided '050309' - A corporate number is required '050339' - The start date is invalid '050340' - The end date is invalid '050355' - The end date is not later than the start date '050399' - A travel agency number is required '050444' - An unapproved vendor id was provided '050502' - A search token is required for this request type '050505' - A frequent guest number is required '050510' - Unknown ARC/IATA confirmation number for cancel and rebook '050514' - An invalid agency address was provided in the request '050528' - An invalid rate category was provided in the request '050533' - A confirmation number was not provided '050534' - A commit reservation must have the same property code as its corresponding hold reservation request '050535' - A frequent guest number change requires a cancel and a rebook '050536' - A corporate number change requires a cancel and a rebook '050537' - A travel agency number change requires a cancel and a rebook '050543' - User sessions are currently at capacity '050551' - Invalid remark text was provided in the request '050552' - An invalid service code was provided '050553' - An invalid service field was provided '050573' - FMDS system is not available. '050574' - The rate value in one or more rate change items is not in decimal format. '050575' - One or more input dates failed Holidex date validation. '050576' - Start date of reservation does not match first rate change item. '050577' - End date of reservation does not match the last rate change item date plus the number of nights. '050578' - The rate change date in one or more rate change items is not equal to the date plus number of nights of the previous rate change item. '050579' - Invalid rate change currency code. '050580' - Invalid rate change number of decimals. '050581' - The rate change number of decimals in the request does not match the rate changes currency code number of decimals. '050582' - The number of nights value in one or more rate change items is not in decimal format. '050606' - Not enough available rooms for the request '050611' - An error occurred in the directory request '050617' - Unknown error '050618' - An invalid rate category was provided '050621' - Too many parameters passed in request '050624' - Priority club number does not exist '050626' - An invalid alliance number was provided '050628' - A priority club number is required '050629' - A cancelled reservation cannot be associated '050632' - The reservation is already part of an association '050639' - An invalid action was submitted '050648' - A force override/waitlist is only available to SCC members '050649' - SCC member benefits are only available at InterContinental hotels '050650' - A force override is invalid, the hotel has availability '050651' - No rooms are available. Wait list bookings are supported '050652' - Rooms are available. Wait list bookings are not supported '050653' - Room type/class not available for a force override reservation '050657' - Only one room is allowed for an override request '050700' - Rate code is not available. '050711' - Suspended Reservations Restricted '050712' - Pending Sell Restricted '050713' - Pending Modify Restricted. '050714' - Pending Cancel Restricted. '050715' - File maintenance active at requested hotel. '050732' - The Create Reservation Group request is invalid. '050733' - There is a confirmation number mismatch. '050734' - The group in the request is not an Easy Group. '050735' - The number of rooms per day is less than the minimum allowed for Easy Groups. '050736' - The number of rooms per day exceeds the maximum allowed for Easy Groups. '050737' - An invalid confirmation number was used in the request. '050738' - An invalid IATA (travel agency) number was used in the request. '050739' - An invalid meeting field was provided. '050750' - An invalid group code was provided. '050751' - An invalid group name was provided. '050752' - An invalid guest was provided. '050753' - An invalid guest name was provided. '050754' - An invalid guest surname was provided. '050755' - An invalid phone was provided. '050756' - An invalid email was provided. '050757' - An invalid email language was provided. '051001' - The Holidex reservation system does not recognize this transaction. '051007' - The Holidex reservation system is unable to process the transaction. '051011' - A message ID is required. '051012' - The Holidex reservation system does not have a user profile for the originating channel of the transaction. '051014' - The specified requestor is not permitted to perform this transaction '051015' - The Holidex reservation system XML message processing is unavailable at this time '051016' - An invalid requestor id was provided '051100' - The Holidex reservation system was unable to locate the party or name '051290' - An invalid date or number of nights was provided '051346' - An invalid number of nights was provided. '051641' - Frequent guest name does not match name on PNR '051644' - Total address exceeds 128 characters '051650' - An invalid service request field was provided '052101' - Failure writing to Holidex socket '052102' - NumberFormatException occurred unmarshalling HAPI message '052103' - The reservation system encountered a problem while processing the request '052104' - The reservation system encountered a problem while processing the request '052105' - The reservation system encountered a problem while processing the request '052106' - Unmarshalling exception retrieving the reservation '052107' - Unmarshalled HAPI message length is less than or equal to 0 '052108' - The transformer was unable to unmarshall a response '052109' - No rooms available '052110' - Number of nights is invalid '052111' - Reservation modification not permitted '052112' - Invalid confirmation or cancellation number '052113' - The requested rate is not available '052114' - The check out date is invalid '052115' - Attempt to modify a reservation which is already being modified '052116' - The modify session has expired '052117' - Invalid hotel code provided '052118' - Insufficient data to retrieve availability '052119' - Invalid Confirmation Number '052120' - Confirmation Number not found or non displayable '052121' - The check in date is invalid '052122' - The corporate number is invalid '052123' - Reservation system unable to process request '052124' - The IATA/agent number is invalid '052125' - Unable to change the socket timeout '052126' - Invalid credit card number provided '052127' - NO participating hotels found for this rate code '052128' - The Frequent Guest number is invalid '052129' - The room type is invalid '052130' - The rate code is invalid '052131' - A deposit is required '052132' - This rate code is not supported at this hotel '052133' - The Priority Club system is unavailable at this time '052134' - This reservation cannot be cancelled or modified '052135' - The convention or group does not exist '052136' - The convention or group cannot be booked on the Web '052137' - The reservation has no active accommodation segments '052138' - The reservation system was unable to process your request '052139' - This rate is secure - unable to display '052140' - This reservation may not be cancelled or modified '052141' - The name provided contains characters not accepted in our reservation system. '052142' - The credit card entered is not accepted at this hotel. '052143' - Reservations are currently unavailable. '052144' - Spaces or invalid characters in guarantee or deposit field. '052145' - Guarantee required for this reservation. '052146' - The frequent guest account does not have enough points for the requested room. '052147' - Unknown reservation system error. '052148' - Invalid number of rooms '052149' - The reservation cannot be viewed via the Internet. '052150' - The hotel is sold out. '052151' - The name provided does not match the name on the frequent guest record. '052152' - The address is invalid '052153' - The comment field is invalid. '052154' - General rules exception. '052155' - Invalid booking code. '052156' - Invalid phone number. '052157' - Invalid convention or group code. '052158' - Unmatched reservation. '052159' - Room type invalid for hotel. '052160' - Correct number of adults. '052161' - No items found for request. '052162' - The room or rate is not available for the selected stay. '052163' - The number in party exceeds the maximum room occupancy. '052164' - Invalid hold type. '052165' - Invalid deposit amount. '052166' - 24 Hour hold is unavailable. '052167' - Requested rate does not allow guarantee to hotel. '052168' - The reservation system encountered a problem while marshalling the request '059999' - The HolidexTransformer produced an EBS domain class that does not match the expected response domain class</wsdl:documentation> <!--=======================================================================--> <!--These ports/endpoints define how requests get to the ESB from consumers--> <!--=======================================================================--> <wsdl:port name="ReservationServicePortHTTP-ESBBindingComponent" binding="crsResResSI:ReservationServiceSoap-HTTPBinding"> <soap:address location=""/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--This schema defines a data structure that's commonly referred to as the ATP common header which must be present in all ATP service requests. All domain-specific service request messages must include this schema. Service responses messages from Service Providers are also expected to contain this common header along with some additional data. The data structure defines various data elements used for various purposes ranging from authentication and authorization, statistics and telematics, and to determine the status of the service request (success/failure.)--> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/common/ATPCommonServiceTypes/v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:atpCommonst="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/common/ATPCommonServiceTypes/v1"> <xs:complexType name="LanguageType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element is used to designate the language internationalization information as it relates to the associated transaction. Any translatable information should be translated as specified by the supplied ISO language code and ISO country code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="isoCountryCode" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="isoLanguageCode" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ChannelType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="subChannel" type="atpCommonst:ChannelType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="HeaderVersionType"> <xs:attribute name="major" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="minor" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="build" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EnvironmentType"> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UserType"> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OriginatingSessionType"> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransactionIDType"> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransactionSequenceType"> <xs:attribute name="number" type="xs:unsignedInt" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransactionLoggingType"> <xs:attribute name="level" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="HeaderType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="language" type="atpCommonst:LanguageType"/> <xs:element name="channel" type="atpCommonst:ChannelType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="headerVersion" type="atpCommonst:HeaderVersionType"/> <xs:element name="environment" type="atpCommonst:EnvironmentType"/> <xs:element name="user" type="atpCommonst:UserType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="originatingSession" type="atpCommonst:OriginatingSessionType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="transactionId" type="atpCommonst:TransactionIDType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="transactionSequence" type="atpCommonst:TransactionSequenceType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="transactionLogging" type="atpCommonst:TransactionLoggingType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeaderType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="atpCommonst:HeaderType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sendTimeStamp" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="header" type="atpCommonst:RequestHeaderType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResponseHeaderType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="atpCommonst:HeaderType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="transactionStatus" type="atpCommonst:TransactionStatusType"/> <xs:element name="clientTransactionDuration" type="atpCommonst:TransactionDurationType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="serviceTransactionDuration" type="atpCommonst:TransactionDurationType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="header" type="atpCommonst:ResponseHeaderType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="StatusType"> <xs:attribute name="statusArea" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="statusCode" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="statusDescription" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="StatusesType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="atpCommonst:StatusType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransactionStatusType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="successes" type="atpCommonst:StatusesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="warnings" type="atpCommonst:StatusesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="errors" type="atpCommonst:StatusesType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="fatalErrors" type="atpCommonst:StatusesType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="transactionSuccessful" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:crsResCmnEN="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commonenums/v2" xmlns:crsResCmnDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2"> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commonenums/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/CommonEnums.xsd"/> <xs:simpleType name="LocalDateTimeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A local date/time, i.e. has no time zone.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"> <!--This pattern will be unioned with the base type's pattern. In a local date/time, none of 'Z', '+', '-' is allowed following the 'T'.--> <xs:pattern value=".+T[^Z+-]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LocalDateType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A local date, i.e. has no time zone.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"> <!--This pattern will be unioned with the base type's pattern. In a local date, 9 is the last valid index of a hyphen.--> <xs:pattern value=".{9}[^Z:+-]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LocalTimeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A local time, i.e. has no time zone.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:time"> <!--This pattern will be unioned with the base type's pattern. In a local time, none of 'Z', '+', '-' is allowed.--> <xs:pattern value="[^Z+-]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="PersonalInfoType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Use this type to define a personal info item.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="crsResCmnDT:GuestNameType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="title" name="lastName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PersonalInfoListType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="personalInfo" <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/ratedatatypes/v2" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:crsResCmnDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2" xmlns:crsResResEN="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/enums/v2" xmlns:crsResRateRuleDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/rateruledatatypes/v2" xmlns:crsResRateDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/ratedatatypes/v2"> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/CommonDataTypes.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/enums/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/ReservationEnums.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/rateruledatatypes/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/RateRuleDataTypes.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="RateType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate Type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="rateCategoryCode" type="crsResCmnDT:RateCategoryCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Holidex Rate Category. For requested rates, this field will be returned for corporate rates and rates with a rate level profile. For non-requested rates, this field will be returned if the SOA user does not bypass rate code conversion.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="externalRateCategoryCode" type="crsResCmnDT:RateCategoryCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate category. Rate code could be an external representation of LNR, PRF, VCP, VCO or external rate category. The size could be 3 to 6 alphanumeric. This field will only be present when the external rate category code has a different value from the internal Holidex rate category.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="actionCode" type="crsResCmnDT:ActionCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>NS-Need Sell, FS-Forced Sell, FH - forced hurdle, FO-Override, WL-Wait list and NR-No Record</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="group" type="crsResRateDT:GroupInfoType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Convention group information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="commissionable" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Commission applies for the rate. true or false</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="suppressRateDisplay" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Suppress Rate Display. true or false</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="applyPcrPoints" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Apply priority club points. true or false</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="croGuaranteeable" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates whether CRO can guarantee the rate to the Hotel.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="identificationRequired" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ID required indicator, (true/false)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="pcrNumberRequired" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Priority club number required (true/false)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="couponVoucherRequired" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Coupon Voucher required indicator, (true/false)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="taxInclusive" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Taxes (true/false) true = Included. Indicates taxes are included in the room price for this rate. Since this setting is at the rate level it overrides the setting at the house level. false = Excluded. Indicates taxes are not included in the room price for this rate. Since this setting is at the rate level it overrides the setting at the house level. If the rate is not set to include or excluded taxes and is instead set to use the house level settings, this attribute will not be present. The house level serves as the default values and the rate level indicator is the exception.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cancelByHotelOnly" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Cancel by hotel only(true/false). Allows original booking GDS to cancel</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="hold24hr" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>24 hour hold is open, (true/false). Caution: The meaning of this has changed since ETP. It is now unmarshalled from the "Hold24" attribute. To replicate previous functionality, check that advanceBookingRule has a duration of 24 hours.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="minimumStayNights" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Minimum stay in nights required for the rate</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="maximumStayNights" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Maximum stay in nights allowed for the rate</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="rateAccepted" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Input Rate Accepted, (true/false). The rates from the input sell/modify request were used in the booking.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="valueAdded" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate value added indicator, (true/false)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="easyGroup" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Easy Group Category (true or false)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="shortRateCategoryDesc" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Short rate category description. <xs:documentation>Section 2 -Additional Details. 1-450 chars</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="sectionThree" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Section 3 -Terms and Conditions. 1-300 chars</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AmenityType"> C=Confirmable and Complementary, D=Confirmable with cost R= On Request and complementary S=On Request with Cost, E=Exists but no further Information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amenity Code Descriptions. maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="postalCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="countryCode" type="crsResCmnDT:CountryCodeType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/findreservationsdatatypes/v2" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:crsResCmnDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2" xmlns:crsResResDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/v2" xmlns:crsResFindDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/findreservationsdatatypes/v2"> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/CommonDataTypes.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/ReservationDataTypes.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="FindReservationsItemsListType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>List of hotel booking information items (reservation number, room type, rate category, etc.)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="reservationItems" type="crsResFindDT:FindReservationsItemType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FindReservationsItemType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Use this type to define a result of finding reservations.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="reservationNumber" type="crsResCmnDT:ReservationNumberType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Confirmation/cancellation number. Also known as reservation number. (string with length 8)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cancelled" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Reservation response status. Whether the reservation is cancelled or active.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="personInfo" type="crsResCmnDT:GuestNameType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Person name data.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="hotelMnemonic" type="crsResCmnDT:HotelMnemonicType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Hotel code (string with length 5)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="checkInDate" type="crsResCmnDT:LocalDateType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Arrival date</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="checkOutDate" type="crsResCmnDT:LocalDateType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Departure date</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="rateCategoryCode" type="crsResCmnDT:RateCategoryCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate category code as used in Holidex (from 5 to 8 character mnemonic)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="roomItem" type="crsResResDT:RoomItemType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Room item description for reservation (Room code, Number of rooms, Amount)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/housepolicydatatypes/v2" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:crsResCmnDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2" xmlns:crsResHousePolicyDT="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/housepolicydatatypes/v2" xmlns:crsResHousePolicyEN="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/housepolicyenums/v2"> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/CommonDataTypes.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/housepolicyenums/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/HousePolicyEnums.xsd"/> <xs:simpleType name="StartLocalDateType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A local start date with restriction (cannot be more than 2019-12-31)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="crsResCmnDT:LocalDateType"> <xs:maxInclusive value="2019-12-31"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="HousePoliciesListType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contain list of house policy items that are returned during of retrieve house policy operation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="housePolicy" type="crsResHousePolicyDT:HousePolicyType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="HousePolicyType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents the house policy item resulting from a request for the house policies.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="startDate" type="crsResCmnDT:LocalDateType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Start date</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="specialEventRestriction" type="crsResHousePolicyEN:SpecialEventRestrictionTypeEnum" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Special Event or Restriction</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="minimumStayNumberOfDays" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Minimum Stay</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="maximumStayNumberOfDays" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Maximum Stay</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="closedToArrival" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates whether hotel is closed to arrivals</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="depositType" type="crsResHousePolicyEN:DepositAndCancelPenaltyTypeEnum" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Deposit Type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="depositNumberOfDays" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Deposit number of days</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="depositDueAtTimeOfBooking" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Set to 'true' when depositNumberOfDays is '0'</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="advanceCancelPenaltyType" type="crsResHousePolicyEN:DepositAndCancelPenaltyTypeEnum" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Advance cancel penalty type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="advanceCancelPenaltyNumberOfDays" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Number of days from booking time when cancellation in advance can be done. '0' means that cancellation can be done only in the day of booking</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="advanceCancelPenaltyAtTimeOfBooking" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Set to 'true' when advanceCancelPenaltyNumberOfDays is '0'</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cancelPenaltyType" type="crsResHousePolicyEN:DepositAndCancelPenaltyTypeEnum" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Cancel penalty type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cancelPenaltyNumberOfDays" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Number of days from booking time when simple cancellation can be done. '0' means that cancellation can be done only in the day of booking</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cancelPenaltyAtTimeOfBooking" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Set to 'true' when cancelPenaltyNumberOfDays is '0'</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="privilege24hour" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates whether 24 HR privilege is open at the hotel</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="guaranteeRequired" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Guarantee required</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="blackout" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>true means that the time period cannot be booked through ATP system and has to be booked directly at the hotel</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/housepolicyenums/v2" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:crsResHousePolicyEN="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/housepolicyenums/v2"> <xs:simpleType name="DepositAndCancelPenaltyTypeEnum"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents the cancel penalty types.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:enumeration value="FIRST_NIGHT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Denotes that the policy's cost is calculated from the rate for the first night only</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="LAST_NIGHT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Denotes that the policy's cost is calculated from the rate for the last night only</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="FIRST_AND_LAST_NIGHTS"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Denotes that the policy's cost is calculated from the rates for the first and last night</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ENTIRE_STAY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Denotes that the policy's cost is the cost of the entire stay</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SpecialEventRestrictionTypeEnum"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Special Event or Special Restriction.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:enumeration value="SPECIAL_EVENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Special Event</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SPECIAL_RESTRICTION"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Special Restriction</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/itinerarydatatypes/v2" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/commondatatypes/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/CommonDataTypes.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://atp.ihg.com/schema/crs/reservations/reservation/enums/v2" schemaLocation="../../../../../schema/crs/reservations/reservation/datatypes/ReservationEnums.xsd"/> <xs:simpleType name="ItineraryWarningEnum"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents warnings that may me returned with itinerary items</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NOT_ACCESSIBLE_VIA_WEB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Not accessible via the web</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ReservationSegmentType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents the reservation segment.</xs:documentation> Used for Guarantee Method</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReservationConfirmationItemsType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents confirmation item elements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="confirmationNumber" type="crsResCmnDT:ConfirmationNumberType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="cancellationNumber" type="crsResCmnDT:CancellationNumberType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="warning" type="crsResItineraryDT:ItineraryWarningEnum" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="reservationSegments" type="crsResItineraryDT:ReservationSegmentsListType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReservationConfirmationItemsListType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>List of confirmation items returned during of confirmation request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="confirmationItem" type="crsResItineraryDT:ReservationConfirmationItemsType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReservationSegmentsListType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>List of Reservation Segments.
